levels.description: Equipped Operator will be considered part of the [Kazimierz] faction; during battle, DP Cost <@ba.vup>-4</>, Initial SP <@ba.vup>+10</>, Redeployment Time <@ba.vup>-24%</>; when there are at least <@ba.vup>3</> [Kazimierz] Operators on the field, all [Kazimierz] Operators gain this effect; when there are at least <@ba.vup>6</> [Kazimierz] Operators on the field, the effect increases to <@ba.vup>2.5</>x
